lead_paragraph: ABRAMSON--Richard. The Multiple Myeloma Research Foundation and our Board of Directors mourn the loss of our dear friend Richard Abramson. Richard's resiliency, passion, indomitable spirit and deep commitment to the fight against cancer in honor of all patients and families will always provide us inspiration. Our deepest appreciation and condolences go out to Lorraine and his loved ones. 1/3
